main event: A bright pink object was observed losing altitude and disappearing in the sky.
interesting points: The sighting occurred near Hollywood and Van Nuys, California at 1900 hrs., The observation lasted approximately 3 minutes., The object was described as having a stubby delta wing and being smaller than a jet., The consensus among observers was that it could be a drone or a small ATV., No photographs were included with the report.
witness description: ground-based observation with radar and visual confirmation
